column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////First taste of Chicago style pizza. Prices are high. Did not Deliver to the room. Had to go to the lobby to pick it up
column2: not sure if that is common in Chicago. I mistakenly tipped the delivery man.  For two waters and this pizza plus tip I paid $50. I would of been more satisfied with Pizza Hut. I also had Added mushrooms to  the pizza. There is a sprinkling of mushroom on it. Pizza was mediocre taste. Really what else is there to say. As far as delivery goes don't do it. Price is high for the taste. I am sure there has got to be better. Not a good diet cheat meal.
